// jobs.jsx import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./jobs.css"; const jobsData = [ { id: 1, title: "Frontend Developer Intern", company: "TechNova Labs", location: "Remote", skills: ["React", "CSS", "JavaScript"], level: "Beginner", type: "Internship", description: "Work on building responsive web UIs using React. Collaborate with designers to implement modern front-end solutions.", }, { id: 2, title: "Data Science Intern", company: "Insight Analytics", location: "Dhaka, Bangladesh", skills: ["Python", "Pandas", "Scikit-learn"], level: "Intermediate", type: "Internship", description: "Assist in data preprocessing, visualization, and building basic machine learning models for business insights.", }, { id: 3, title: "Machine Learning Research Assistant", company: "AI Research Hub", location: "Remote", skills: ["TensorFlow", "NumPy", "Data Cleaning"], level: "Intermediate", type: "Part-time", description: "Support ongoing AI research projects, train models, and document results for publication.", }, { id: 4, title: "UI/UX Designer Intern", company: "Creative Studio BD", location: "Dhaka, Bangladesh", skills: ["Figma", "Adobe XD", "Prototyping"], level: "Beginner", type: "Internship", description: "Design and refine UI mockups for mobile and web apps with guidance from the design lead.", }, { id: 5, title: "Backend Developer (Node.js)", company: "CodeCrafters", location: "Remote", skills: ["Node.js", "Express", "MongoDB"], level: "Intermediate", type: "Freelance", description: "Develop REST APIs and integrate them with front-end clients. Flexible freelance opportunity.", }, { id: 6, title: "Full Stack Developer Intern", company: "DevWorks", location: "Chittagong, Bangladesh", skills: ["React", "Node.js", "MongoDB"], level: "Intermediate", type: "Internship", description: "Work on both client-side and server-side of web projects. Exposure to agile workflow.", }, { id: 7, title: "Data Entry & Cleaning Assistant", company: "EduData Solutions", location: "Remote", skills: ["Excel", "Google Sheets", "Python"], level: "Beginner", type: "Part-time", description: "Perform data entry and basic data cleaning tasks for educational datasets.", }, { id: 8, title: "Content Writer (Tech)", company: "ByteWords", location: "Remote", skills: ["Writing", "SEO", "Research"], level: "Beginner", type: "Freelance", description: "Write engaging and SEO-optimized content related to technology and software trends.", }, { id: 9, title: "Data Visualization Intern", company: "ChartIQ BD", location: "Dhaka, Bangladesh", skills: ["Tableau", "PowerBI", "Python"], level: "Intermediate", type: "Internship", description: "Create dashboards and visuals for analytical reports using real-world datasets.", }, { id: 10, title: "Web Developer Trainee", company: "SoftBridge Technologies", location: "Remote", skills: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript"], level: "Beginner", type: "Internship", description: "Learn and assist in developing front-end web components using HTML, CSS, and JS.", }, ]; export default function Jobs() { const [filter, setFilter] = useState("All"); const [selectedJob, setSelectedJob] = useState(null); const filteredJobs = filter === "All" ? jobsData : jobsData.filter((job) => job.type === filter); return (

Opportunities for Students

{["All", "Internship", "Part-time", "Full-time", "Freelance"].map((f) => ( ))}
{filteredJobs.map((job) => (
setSelectedJob(job)} // show modal on click >

{job.title}

{job.company}

))}
{/* Modal for job details */} {selectedJob && (
setSelectedJob(null)}>
e.stopPropagation()} // prevent closing on modal click >

{selectedJob.title}

Company: {selectedJob.company}

Location: {selectedJob.location}

Skills: {selectedJob.skills.join(", ")}

Experience: {selectedJob.level}

Type: {selectedJob.type}

{selectedJob.description}

)}
); }
